name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by DiamondMonster, michellemarie, chatterjee, Siah, dracer2)

name: clever-nickname
text: THE HOG SHALL LAY WITH THE PRAWN.

name: alarumba
text: My respect for Onstad just increased ten fold seeing that banjo.

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ted0phile, saddestking, VeniVidiEffluxi, envika, mashisoyo, atticusonline, Art-Vader, jezebel, hurfdurf, tellumo)

name: heccibiggs
text: You just go out of your way to be a dick, don't you.

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
There's a banjo like that around the corner, a-waitin' for soticoto.
Just a-strummin' that little duelin' banjo theme to itself in the corner, all the time in th' world.

Ba-da-dum-dum-dum-dum-dum-de-dum....

name: soticoto
text: To a normal person that'd be "going out of their way" ... but to me, it is just the way I am. Sorry. I reserve the right to be the way I want to be, no matter how much I'm hated for it.

name: wmscottsimpson
text: You tend to come across as being pretty proud of the fact that you don't care that people don't like you. OK. No one's arguing that there's an objective need for you to change the way you are. They're just saying you're a dick.

name: envika
text: he had a kid born the day before, chill your hash cookies

name: charchar
text: Onstad shows promise as a photographer.  That is some mad decent composition

name: funcrusherplus
text: Chris Onstad is a hard painting man, Grumbacher   Winsor & Newton 4 Life!
